article_title: U.S. Forces Conducted Operation in Somalia, Pentagon Says
article_text:
U.S. military forces conducted an operation in Somalia on Monday against the al-Shabaab militant group, the Pentagon said.

Officials declined to give any further information on the operation. "We are assessing the results of the operation and will provide additional information as and when appropriate," said Rear Adm. John Kirby, a Pentagon spokesman.

The U.S. action came after Somali government forces regained...
